caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 22 A–D.
Penthicodes variegata
, genitalia 3. A, pygofer, anal tube and gonostyli, left lateral view. B, anal tube, posterior view. C, anal tube, dorsal view. D, pygofer and gonostyli, postero-ventral view. An : anal tube; G : gonostyli; Py : pygofer. Scale 2 mm.
